fields.name: duration
fields.description: Length of the connection in seconds.

fields.name: protocol_type
fields.description: Type of protocol used in the connection (e.g., TCP, UDP, ICMP).

fields.name: service
fields.description: Network service on the destination (e.g., HTTP, FTP, SMTP).

fields.name: flag
fields.description: Status of the connection (e.g., SF for successful connection, REJ for rejected).

fields.name: src_bytes
fields.description: Number of data bytes sent from the source to the destination.

fields.name: dst_bytes
fields.description: Number of data bytes sent from the destination to the source.

fields.name: land
fields.description: Boolean indicating whether the source and destination IP and port numbers are the same (1 if true, 0 otherwise).

fields.name: wrong_fragment
fields.description: Number of wrong or fragmented packets in the connection.

fields.name: urgent
fields.description: Number of urgent packets in the connection.

fields.name: hot
fields.description: Number of 'hot' indicators (e.g., access to sensitive files or directories).

fields.name: num_failed_logins
fields.description: Number of failed login attempts.

fields.name: logged_in
fields.description: Boolean indicating if the connection is from a successful login (1 if true, 0 otherwise).

fields.name: num_compromised
fields.description: Number of compromised conditions.

fields.name: root_shell
fields.description: Boolean indicating if the root shell was accessed (1 if true, 0 otherwise).

fields.name: su_attempted
fields.description: Boolean indicating if a 'su' command was attempted (1 if true, 0 otherwise).

fields.name: num_root
fields.description: Number of root accesses.

fields.name: num_file_creations
fields.description: Number of file creation operations.

fields.name: num_shells
fields.description: Number of shell prompts invoked.

fields.name: num_access_files
fields.description: Number of operations on access control files.

fields.name: num_outbound_cmds
fields.description: Number of outbound commands in a connection.

fields.name: is_host_login
fields.description: Boolean indicating if the login is a host login (1 if true, 0 otherwise).

fields.name: is_guest_login
fields.description: Boolean indicating if the login is a guest login (1 if true, 0 otherwise).

fields.name: count
fields.description: Number of connections to the same host as the current connection in the past two seconds.

fields.name: srv_count
fields.description: Number of connections to the same service as the current connection in the past two seconds.

fields.name: serror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections that have SYN errors.

fields.name: srv_serror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the same service that have SYN errors.

fields.name: rerror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections that have REJ errors.

fields.name: srv_rerror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the same service that have REJ errors.

fields.name: same_srv_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the same service.

fields.name: diff_srv_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to different services.

fields.name: srv_diff_host_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to different hosts for the same service.

fields.name: dst_host_count
fields.description: Number of connections to the same destination host as the current connection in the past two seconds.

fields.name: dst_host_srv_count
fields.description: Number of connections to the same service as the current connection in the past two seconds.

fields.name: dst_host_same_srv_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the same service at the destination host.

fields.name: dst_host_diff_srv_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to different services at the destination host.

fields.name: dst_host_same_src_port_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the same source port at the destination host.

fields.name: dst_host_srv_diff_host_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to different hosts for the same service at the destination.

fields.name: dst_host_serror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the destination that have SYN errors.

fields.name: dst_host_srv_serror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the destination for the same service that have SYN errors.

fields.name: dst_host_rerror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the destination that have REJ errors.

fields.name: dst_host_srv_rerror_rate
fields.description: Percentage of connections to the destination for the same service that have REJ errors.
